file_content.text: This is Ops: possible security breach. A patrol team has gone missing.
Ops to all security teams: report in!
Ops to Red Team: report in!
Ops to Green Team: report in!
Ops to Blue Team: report in!
Ops to Gold Team: report in!
Ops to Red Team: you haven't checked in. Respond!
Ops to Blue Team: you haven't checked in. Respond!
Ops to Green Team: you haven't checked in. Report!
Ops to Gold Team: you haven't checked in. Report!
Ops to all security forces: increase patrols immediately!
Ops to all security forces: intruders spotted in the city! Deploy to intercept!
The operations center is under attack! Need reinforcements, now!
Ops to all teams: where are you scumbags? I need backup, now!
Ops to all security forces: red alert! Lock down all city entrances and the spaceport! Find and eliminate the intruders!
We're here, we're here... lighten up, will ya?
Red Team, all clear.
Green Team, all clear.
Blue Team, all clear.
Gold Team, all clear.
Red Team to Ops: we're under attack!
Green Team calling Ops: intruders! Need backup!
Blue Team calling in, we need reinforcements!
Gold Team to Ops--intruders! Send help!
Patrol teams, this is Ops: you've got your assignments. We're here to show the Hutts what we can do, so no room for screwups!
Stick to your patrol zones, maintain contact, and keep your eyes open!
This is Ops: alert! Multiple patrol teams have gone missing!
Lock down all city entrances and the spaceport! All remaining forces, find out who's doing this and take them down!
